title: Pogue Mahone Kiss My Arse: The Story of the Pogues
description: Tells the story of The Pogues, which is as vivid as the music they make. Containing interviews of the managers, agents, label bosses, film-makers, producers, and promoters, this book presents their arguments and drunken spats, their love affairs, the illnesses, the drugs, the sackings, the legal actions, and their over-riding passion for music.
author: Carol Clerk
